lead_paragraph: Damian Lillard extended the Dallas Mavericks' season-opening misery on the court. Dirk Nowitzki's aching Achilles continued it off the court.

headline.print_headline: Lillard Scores 42 as Trail Blazers Beat Mavericks 105-95
headline.main: Lillard Scores 42 as Trail Blazers Beat Mavericks 105-95

snippet: Damian Lillard extended the Dallas Mavericks' season-opening misery on the court. Dirk Nowitzki's aching Achilles continued it off the court....
